akn:section.akn:heading: Auditing of transactions of territorial and local governments

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1469b. Auditing of transactions of territorial and local governments All financial transactions of the territorial and local governments herein provided for, including such transactions of all agencies or instrumentalities established or used by such governments, may be audited by the Government Accountability Office, at its discretion, in accordance with chapter 35 of title 31. (Pub. L. 118–42, div. E, title I, Mar. 9, 2024, 138 Stat. 238.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextHerein provided for, referred to in text, means provided for in the appropriation act cited as the credit to this section.
Codification Section is from the appropriation act cited as the credit to this section.
Prior ProvisionsProvisions similar to those in this section were contained in the following prior appropriations acts: Pub. L. 117–328, div. G, title I, Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 4778. Pub.
